MooseX::Getopt::Strict(3pm) User Contributed Perl Documentation MooseX::Getopt::Strict(3pm)

NAME

MooseX::Getopt::Strict - only make options for attributes with the Getopt metaclass

VERSION

version 0.74

DESCRIPTION

This is an stricter version of "MooseX::Getopt" which only processes the attributes if they explicitly set as "Getopt" attributes. All other attributes are ignored by the command line handler.

SUPPORT

Bugs may be submitted through the RT bug tracker <https://rt.cpan.org/Public/Dist/Display.html?Name=MooseX-Getopt> (or bug-MooseX-Getopt@rt.cpan.org <mailto:bug-MooseX-Getopt@rt.cpan.org>).

There is also a mailing list available for users of this distribution, at <http://lists.perl.org/list/moose.html>.

There is also an irc channel available for users of this distribution, at "#moose" on "irc.perl.org" <irc://irc.perl.org/#moose>.
